bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Charlottesville Lyceum was a literary and scientific society founded about 1836 and active perhaps as late as 1861.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The minute book of the Charlottesville Lyceum was kept by University of Virginia professor John B. Minor and other secretaries.
